components/products/details:
<dl class="product-details-block">
  <dt class="product-details-name {{#unless product.stock_level}}product-details-hidden{{/unless}}" data-product-stock>{{lang 'product.current_stock'}}:</dt>
  <dd class="product-details-value {{#unless product.stock_level}}product-details-hidden{{/unless}}" data-product-stock data-product-stock-level>{{product.stock_level}}</dd>

  {{#if product.sku}}
    <dt class="product-details-name product-details-sku">{{lang 'product.sku'}}:</dt>
    <dd class="product-details-value product-details-sku" data-product-sku>{{product.sku}}</dd>
  {{/if}}
  {{#if product.condition}}
    <dt class="product-details-name product-details-condition">{{lang 'product.condition'}}:</dt>
    <dd class="product-details-value product-details-condition">{{product.condition}}</dd>
  {{/if}}
  {{#if product.availability}}
    <dt class="product-details-name product-details-availability">{{lang 'product.availability'}}:</dt>
    <dd class="product-details-value product-details-availability">{{product.availability}}</dd>
  {{/if}}
  {{#if product.weight}}
    <dt class="product-details-name product-details-weight">{{lang 'product.weight'}}:</dt>
    <dd class="product-details-value product-details-weight" data-product-weight>{{product.weight}}</dd>
  {{/if}}
  {{#if product.gift_wrapping_available}}
    <dt class="product-details-name product-details-gift-wrapping">{{lang 'product.gift_wrapping'}}:</dt>
    <dd class="product-details-value product-details-gift-wrapping">{{lang 'product.gift_wrapping_available'}}</dd>
  {{/if}}
  {{#if product.shipping}}
    {{#if product.shipping.calculated}}
      <dt class="product-details-name product-details-shipping">{{lang 'product.shipping'}}:</dt>
      <dd class="product-details-value product-details-shipping">{{lang 'product.shipping_calculated'}}</dd>
    {{else}}
      {{#if product.shipping.price '===' 0}}
        <dt class="product-details-name product-details-shipping">{{lang 'product.shipping'}}:</dt>
        <dd class="product-details-value product-details-shipping">{{lang 'product.shipping_free'}}</dd>
      {{else}}
        <dt class="product-details-name product-details-shipping">{{lang 'product.shipping'}}:</dt>
        <dd class="product-details-value product-details-shipping">{{lang 'product.shipping_fixed' amount=product.shipping.price.formatted}}</dd>
      {{/if}}
    {{/if}}
  {{/if}}

  {{#each product.custom_fields}}
    <dt class="product-details-name product-details-custom">{{name}}:</dt>
    <dd class="product-details-value product-details-custom">{{value}}</dd>
  {{/each}}
</dl>
